Awesome view at night. The roses change to multiple shades of lights. Try to dine at the deck for overlooking view of roses and cool sea breeze. Short travel thru Cebu-Cordova Link Expressway. Have lots of parking space with a fee. Take note also of a minimal entrance fee upon entry.

10k roses is a great experience. A very picturesque place and a nice place to stay in to watch the sun slowly go down.

Passed by here from the airport to the hotel. Main attraction is the 10k lighted artificial roses. Nice atmosphere. Entrance fee is 20 pesos and 10 pesos for seniors/pwd. They have cafe/restaurant to enjoy. Though you may experience surge of visitors fridays and weekends at night.
Lol view is nice but thats it. Lol
